name: Follow The Light (cogile)
description:
A vibrant, gloomy neo-noir world. A lost moth that can’t find its way home. That’s where you come into play, using streetlights as guidance. Light switches are scattered over the level in a way that lets players use multiple solutions to beat it. Various obstacles like spikes or lamps dangerous to the moth are present.

I  N  S  T  R  U  C  T  I  O  N  S

-Arrow keys to move 

-"X" to jump

-"C" to interact

T  I  P  S   &  T  R  I  C  K  S

-There is more than one way to complete a level

-If you want to get another ending, don't let the moth die too many times.
